00061 #define SSL_MAX_CONTENT_LEN         16384
00062 
00063 /*
00064  * Allow an extra 512 bytes for the record header
00065  * and encryption overhead (counter + MAC + padding).
00066  */
00067 #define SSL_BUFFER_LEN (SSL_MAX_CONTENT_LEN + 512)

00132 /*
00133  * This structure is used for session resuming.
00134  */
00135 struct _ssl_session
00136 {
00137     time_t start;               
00138     int cipher;                 
00139     int length;                 
00140     unsigned char id[32];       
00141     unsigned char master[48];   
00142     ssl_session *next;          
00143 };

00145 struct _ssl_context
00146 {
00147     /*
00148      * Miscellaneous
00149      */

00169      * Session layer

00175     int (*s_set)(ssl_context *);

00178      * Record layer (incoming data)

00182     unsigned char *in_msg;
